snippet: Oscar De La Hoya, who won an Olympic gold medal and became a champion in six weight divisions in winning 10 world titles, was selected for induction into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Oscar De La Hoya, who won an Olympic gold medal and became a champion in six weight divisions in winning 10 world titles, was selected for induction into the International Boxing Hall of Fame.

headline.main: De La Hoya Named to Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: De La Hoya Named to Hall of Fame
